title: Quarkus 2.6.0.Final released - SmallRye Reactive Messaging 3.13 and Kafka 3, programmatic API for caching, Kotlin 1.6 and a lot more!
content: It is my great pleasure to announce the release of Quarkus 2.6.0.Final which comes with some nice changes: Some extensions moved to Quarkiverse Hub SmallRye Reactive Messaging 3.13 and Kafka 3 Programmatic API for caching Smaller image for native executables Built-in UPX compression AWT extension Kotlin 1.6 Camel 3.14 Due...
